mapper.select: SELECT line_name FROM tbl_line WHERE is_disabled = 0 AND line_no = #{lineNo}

SELECT level, line_no, line_parent_no, line_name FROM tbl_line WHERE is_disabled = 0 START WITH line_parent_no IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR line_no = line_parent_no ORDER BY LEVEL, line_parent_no, line_no

select a.prd_code prd_code ,a.prd_name prd_name ,a.prd_desc prd_desc ,a.origin_price origin_price ,a.sale_price sale_price ,a.star_point star_point ,a.prod_image prod_image ,a.creation_date creation_date from ( select prd_code ,prd_name ,prd_desc ,origin_price ,sale_price ,star_point ,prod_image ,creation_date
from product_tbl order by prd_code )a
where rownum <= 4

select b.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from tbl_line
order by line_no desc) a ) b where b.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 8
and b.rn <= (#{page} * 8)
